verb.definition: Remain undamaged or unaffected by; resist.
verb.example: The structure had been designed to withstand high winds.

verb.definition: Offer strong resistance or opposition to (someone or something).

noun.definition: The act of resisting or enduring.
noun.example: The withstanding of the pressure was remarkable.

usage_examples: The bridge is built to withstand earthquakes.
She withstood the pressure to resign.
